name: Long Term Investment
description: Calculate how much your investment will grow over a long period, taking into account compound interest and regular contributions.

name: SIP
description: Determine how much you need to invest or how much you will grow your savings with your SIP, factoring in consistent contributions and projected returns.

name: SWP
description: Determine how much you can withdraw periodically from your investments and how long your funds will last.

name: Step Up SIP
description: Calculate how much you will accumulate with a Step Up SIP, where your investments increase periodically, enhancing your returns over time.

name: Lumpsum
description: Estimate the future value of a one-time lumpsum investment based on expected returns and investment duration.

name: SSY
description: Calculate the maturity amount and returns for investments made under the SSY scheme, tailored for the financial security of a girl child.
